inclusion.criterion: Verified or suspected primary CNS lymphoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient must consent to genetic and metabolomic analysis of their cancer
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Evidence of a CNS mass creating mass-effect or midline shift such that lumbar puncture is contraindicated
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Other contraindications to lumbar puncture according to local guidelines
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a large pericardial effusion with Burkitt's lymphoma, but also has a CNS mass creating mass-effect or midline shift such that lumbar puncture is contraindicated.
